summary: The personal tales of various prostitutes who occupy a brothel.
cast: Machiko Kyô|Ayako Wakao|Michiyo Kogure|Aiko Mimasu|Kenji Sugawara|Yasuko Kawakami|Eitarô Shindô|Bontarô Miake|Haruo Tanaka|Sadako Sawamura|Daisuke Katô|Hisao Toake|Jun Tatara|Osamu Maruyama|Hiroko Machida|Kumeko Urabe|Fujio Harumoto|Yosuke Irie|Ken'ichi Miyajima|Toranosuke Ogawa|Kokuten Kôdô|Eiko Miyoshi|Toshiyuki Obara|Joe Ohara|Shiroyuki Miyajima|Kyôsuke Shiho|Mitsuko Takesato|Sachiko Meguro
title: La calle de la vergüenza
